import React, { Component } from 'react'; import $ from 'jquery'; import { findDOMNode } from 'react-dom'; import '../AdminCss/adminaddstudent.css'; import 'jquery-ui-bundle'; import 'jquery-ui-bundle/jquery-ui.css'; import Navbar from '../../SideNavMenu'; class AdminAddStudent extends Component { constructor(){ super(); this.state={ studentData : { username : '', password : '', rollno : '', year : '', address : '', dateofbirth : '', phone : '', parent : '', role : '', imageURL : '', } } } componentDidMount() { $(function () { $(".datepicker").datepicker(); }); $("#transport").selectmenu({ width: 200, color: "#fff" }); $("#selectmonth").selectmenu({ width: 200, background: '#fff' }); function readURL(input) { if (input.files && input.files[0]) { var reader = new FileReader(); reader.onload = function (e) { $('#profile-img-tag').attr('src', e.target.result); } reader.readAsDataURL(input.files[0]); } } $('#profile-img').change(function () { readURL(this); }); } handleOnChange=(event)=> { let obj_tmp = this.state.studentData; let {name, value} = event.target; obj_tmp[name] = value; console.log(obj_tmp); } render() { return (
Profile Infromation

) } } export default AdminAddStudent;
